name: Tom Friml
aboutDescription:
Experienced software developer with a primary focus on mobile and hybrid application development, complemented by a knack for integrating a wide array of services and frameworks. My proficiency extends to crafting mobile applications for IoT devices or seamlessly integrating blockchain technologies. Lately, my professional focus has been directed towards the exploration of generative AI and its applications within the mobile domain.

Hailing from an embedded systems background, my skill set spans a diverse spectrum, encompassing low-level embedded programming, system and database administration, network architecture, and end-to-end application development.

experiences.description: Development of an offline-first mobile snagging application for Disneyland Paris, streamlining information gathering for technical experts in the field and enhancing communication with maintenance services for problem-solving.

Development of a Progressive Web App for security system technicians, enabling them to generate comprehensive PDF quotes. This allows for the immediate delivery of quotes to clients after their visit, thereby increasing the conversion rate.

Development of the association's website, in collaboration with a group of developers. It provides visitors with the opportunity to learn more about the association and become members.
To date, the website has attracted over 10,000 visits.

projects.name: Premier Couriers
projects.description: Support app for Premier Couriers Customers and Drivers to swiftly upload their same-day deliveries and enable their customers to receive delivery notifications.

projects.name: Heed Installer
projects.description: Install new Heed sensors and new beacons, replace batteries, and uninstall sensors and beacons. The Heed installer lets you capture all location and installation data from your Heed sensors quickly and accurately.

projects.name: Sidekick by NCS
projects.description: Non-custodial digital wallet - the ultimate solution for safe and hassle-free digital asset transactions.

projects.name: Waveband
projects.description: Waveband - a multi-spectral dosimeter and data processing toolset. Control and communication app.

projects.name: RFID Ledger
projects.description: Make graduation regalia hire process easier and more efficient. Utilises RFID technology to track and manage the returns.

projects.name: NZ Steel
projects.description: Inventory management app for NZ Steel. The app allows users to scan barcodes and manage stock levels.

projects.name: Shadowspec
projects.description: Control your Shadowspec umbrella with your phone. Easy smart battery and lighting control with hospitality feature.

projects.name: Xeenon Broadcaster
projects.description: Livestreaming app with blockchaing flavouring. Xeenon allows users to stream directly to Livepeer's open broadcasting network.

projects.name: SLSNZ Patrol
projects.description: An electronic patrol and incident management tool for SLSNZ lifeguards.

projects.name: Daily Blends
projects.description: Vending machine application running on Android board. Deployed on custom TCN vending machines.

testimonials.text: Tom has been indispensable at building a lean, functional product for a complicated logistics industry challenge. He was always available to go above and beyond to get the job and releases over the line on time.
testimonials.name: Claire Byrne
testimonials.title: Premier Couriers

testimonials.text: Tom is excellent to work with. Knowledgeable, helpful and with quick turnaround. We engaged him to build an IOT provisioning app for iOS and Android. He did so with ease, working collaboratively with our in house software team to ensure correct functionality, great UX and correct formatting for compliance with app store requirements. We highly recommend him, and would not hesitate to hire him for our next project!
testimonials.name: Garth Tunnicliffe
testimonials.title: Heed
